title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Chart of the Day for Oct. 18
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Chart of the Day for Oct. 18
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUESTS:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his Chart of the Day "Who says the U.S. stock market will fluctuate?" Email Dave at DWilson@bloomberg.net to sign up for the Chart.\u0010\u0010Matthew Kanterman\u0010Telecom and Video Game Analyst\u0010Bloomberg Intelligence\u0010Discussing the decision by Electronic Arts to close its Visceral studio and delay the release of an upcoming action-adventure Star Wars game leaves a big hole in its fiscal 2019 release slate that it needs to fill.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
